name: Monster Movie (Tom Marrec)
description:
Monster Movie is an " horror " narative game created by 6 first year student.

You play Nathan a young men with the dream to became a famous actor but sadly he don't have a lot of thing for him like some talent , but one day a strange productor give him the oppotunity to play on his new horror movie and that where the story beging.

( The voices are in french )
